Class VIF.Record

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xensource.xenapi.VIF.Record
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Types.Record
    Enclosing class:
    VIF

    public static class VIF.Record
extends java.lang.Object
implements Types.Record
    Represents all the fields in a VIF
